description:
Something brand new and completely unexpected! “Christmas Colorfly – Free Color.ing Book for Kids” is an amazing color app that is now available to you 24/7! Enjoy drawing with this incredible and funny app and you will certainly feel as if you are a true artist! A great variety of pictures awaits you! Explore totally new dimensions of digital coloring! This coloring book is now here to entertain you as the happiest holiday is approaching!

- Lots of different illustrations per each category is now at your disposal!
- Easy to color – you just need to tap to select a palette and pick a color!
- Tap to paint and pinch to zoom in/out!
- Many interesting picture designs to paint: Snowman, Santa Claus, Christmas Tree, presents and a lot more!
- It contains a music player - choose the tune you want to listen to while coloring!
- You can save and share your masterpieces via Facebook, Instagram, Messenger and Pinterest!
- This amazing app works offline so you don't need to have Internet connection!
